item.title: Sophie Turner Confirmed as Lara Croft as Prime Video’s ‘Tomb Raider’ Sets Production Start Date
item.description: Chad Hodge is joining creator Phoebe Waller-Bridge as co-showrunner.

item.title: These 3 Actors Are Up Against Barack Obama and David Attenborough for a Best Narrator Emmy
item.description: Competition is stiff for the first-time narrator nominees, as Obama and Attenborough have both won the Emmy multiple times in the past.
